title: Authority to secure federal funds
context: ยง302A-1403 Authority to secure federal funds. The department, the state public charter school commission, a charter school authorizer, director of finance, and governor may take such steps and perform such acts as may be necessary or proper to secure any such federal funds for the purposes specified in sections 302A-1401 and 302A-1402. [L 1996, c 89, pt of ยง2; am L 2006, c 298, ยง20; am L 2012, c 130, ยง13]
